org.apache.jackrabbit.j2ee

Class JNDIConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.jackrabbit.j2ee.AbstractConfig
      • org.apache.jackrabbit.j2ee.JNDIConfig

  • public class JNDIConfig
extends AbstractConfig
    The JNDI config hold information about JNDI connection details. It supports the following properties and init parameters: +-------------------+--------------------+ | Property Name | Init-Param Name | +-------------------+--------------------+ | jndi.enable | {provider spec.} | | java.naming.* | java.naming.* | +-------------------+--------------------+
